title: Modi's government pledges fiscal prudence in India's post-election budget
content: India's government promised spending on job creation but also called for fiscal prudence as it announced its financial budget on Tuesday.
summary: India's government promised spending on job creation but also called for fiscal prudence as it announced its financial budget on Tuesday.

title: Farnborough Air Show kicks off with $51 billion in deals as Airbus shows off new ultra long-haul jet
content: Airbus flew the A321XLR for the first time since it was certified, but its U.S. rival Boeing dominated on the deal-making front.
summary: Airbus flew the A321XLR for the first time since it was certified, but its U.S. rival Boeing dominated on the deal-making front.

title: Hungary told it can't host EU gathering after the latest clash with Putin ally over Ukraine

title: Scientists discover ‘dark oxygen’ being produced by seabed metals in ground-breaking study
content: A team of scientists has discovered that oxygen is being produced by metallic nodules thousands of meters below the surface of the Pacific Ocean.
summary: A team of scientists has discovered that oxygen is being produced by metallic nodules thousands of meters below the surface of the Pacific Ocean.

title: Palestinian rivals Hamas and Fatah sign reconciliation agreement in China
content: This is far from the first time the rival groups have signed reconciliation pacts, only to return to hostilities due to persistent disagreements.
summary: This is far from the first time the rival groups have signed reconciliation pacts, only to return to hostilities due to persistent disagreements.

title: Andy Murray to retire as he says Paris Olympics his 'last ever tennis tournament'
content: Andy Murray will be calling it a day after joining Team GB in Paris following a stellar career that peaked with two famous victories in finals at Wimbledon.
summary: Andy Murray will be calling it a day after joining Team GB in Paris following a stellar career that peaked with two famous victories in finals at Wimbledon.

title: Porsche shares fall 4% after automaker cuts 2024 outlook on aluminium alloy shortage
content: Shares in automaker Porsche fell on Tuesday after the company cut its 2024 outlook, citing a shortage of special aluminium alloys.

title: Wiz walks away from $23 billion deal with Google, will pursue IPO
content: It would have been Google's largest-ever acquisition, but the company has chosen to pursue an IPO rather than an acquisition.

title: Germany's struggling construction sector is showing no signs of a recovery
content: The German construction sector is showing no signs of recovering, even after being in a crisis for months and despite pledges of support from the government.

title: Here's why China was largely unaffected by Friday's IT outage
content: While businesses in the U.S. and Europe woke up Friday to a global IT outage that disrupted airports and hotels, China went into its weekend largely unaffected.
summary: While businesses in the U.S. and Europe woke up Friday to a global IT outage that disrupted airports and hotels, China went into its weekend largely unaffected.

title: China's CSI 300 leads declines in Asia amid mixed trading in the region; India markets fall after budget

title: The CrowdStrike fail and next global IT meltdown already in the making
